note: The Gershgorin Disc Theorem states that all eigenvalues of $N \times N$ matrix, $A$, are contained within the union of $N$ discs in the complex plane, where the $i$th eigenvalue is contained in the disc $D_i = \{ z \in C : \left| z - A _{i i}\right| \le r_i \}$ and $r_i = \sum_{i \ne j} |A_{i j}|$.
